post.desc: Huh. Note that this is not what she says to Reimu after being defeated by her in *Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom*. This is what she says to [**Marisa**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Legacy_of_Lunatic_Kingdom/Story/Marisa%27s_Scenario#Stage_1), and John adjusted the tone to be more tense. Nice.
